TEXT.TITLE: CCR VIDEO <CCCR.O> IN TALKS ON BEING ACQUIRED
TEXT.BODY: CCR Video Corp said it has received an offer to enter into negotiations for <Intercep Investment Corp> to acquire a controlling interest through a tender offer. The company said "The negotiations would determine the terms under which the CCR board of directors could support the INTERCEP tender offer." It gave no further details. Reuter
